title: The First priority
creator_credit: Ray Davey, Joe O'Brien, National Educational Television and United Nations Television
brief_description: A comprehensive summary of the world food problem indicating why it is such a crucial problem today. Shows how the FAO is already coping with the problem and how the campaign is aimed at showing people all over the world what can be done. Gives examples of action projects aimed at long term solutions.
